text: Dana Bumgardner (May 16, 1954 â€“ October 2, 2021) was an American businessman and politician. He was a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly from 2013 until his death. Bumgardner died from liver cancer at his home in Gastonia, North Carolina on October 2, 2021, at age 67. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Dana Bumgardner
